title: Pixel 3a XL wouldn't normal charge or fast charge with factory cable.
content: Tested with one new n one old google USB-C cable, phone would charge on and off for a few second.  Test chargers and cable on the another 3a and they both worked fine.  Charging with generic off brand cables now and phone could charge at slower pace.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3a XL
